tns:patch.keyword: ADMIN GFM Reporting tab - Show settings button is found on template, but after saving it dissapears
tns:patch.author: apicca

script.lang: DELETE FROM amp_features_visibility WHERE id IN (SELECT MAX(dup.id) FROM amp_features_visibility As dup where dup.name in (select b.name from amp_features_visibility b where dup.id <> b.id and dup.name=b.name and dup.description=b.description) GROUP BY dup.name,dup.description,dup.haslevel,dup.parent);
